==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Fouad:''' Hello, Traveler.
:{{DIcon}} You know me?
::'''Fouad:''' Ah, I see I guessed correctly.
::'''Fouad:''' The boss told us what you look like. He said you're our new buddy.
::'''Fouad:''' You have pretty distinct traits, so I recognized you right away.
::'''Fouad:''' Well, since the boss says so, guess that makes you a friend of ours now. The Eremites bid you welcome.
:{{DIcon}} Well, see you.
::'''Fouad:''' Take it easy now!
{{Dialogue end}}
